reviews.title: Overall a great product, comfy and warm.
reviews.review_text: These pants are a great product for the money. I especially like that they are thicker material and have a reinforced crotch area. They also have both draw strings AND belt loops which isnt a very common feature of joggers. They do run a little on the small side, so I had to buy a 4X rather than an 2X for myself and I wear a 40-42 inch waist x 34 inch inseam.
00 it runs pretty small but it looks good got a hold on to it so I lose some more weight

reviews.title: Joggers
reviews.review_text: Read reviews. They do run small so if you buy these buy bigger. they fit perfectly but are a little long

reviews.title: Solf, Comfy with great color
reviews.review_text: I just got my Victorious Men's Drop Crotch Jogger Twill Pants - Dirty Pink - Large and I looooove them they are sold, comfortable and the color is beautiful perfect for launching, walk in the park with the pups, road trip and flying, they are a bit long but hope with the wash is gonna fit just right. I ordering a couple more in different colors :)

reviews.title: Joggers pants
reviews.review_text: I bought two joggers pants, they are easy to slip in and out. I am size 44. From reading the reviews buy one size larger than your size. I bought the 4XL size, two sizes up. Those pants are still smaller and tight. So, if you are size 44 you need to buy the largest size which 5 XL to fit your size. If you are bigger than 44 those joggers pants are not for you. I haven't called to talk to Walmart yet. But I am going to. Other than the size, the joggers pants are nice and comfortable and nice material. The question they ask if I recommend those joggers pants. I do recommend for the material but not on the size. They should have MAYBE option. I am going to say NO for the bigger guys. But for the small size YES

reviews.title: Shorten the pants
reviews.review_text: I bought 4XL were tight and long. I bought the bigger size 5XL were good size but they were extremely long. Shaquille is long enough to fit into them. Because I liked the waist I am homing my pants. Its costing me $17. So if you are size 44, you need size 5XL and you need to shorten them.

reviews.title: Way TOO Big!!! Very Ugly...
reviews.review_text: I read where it said to go up a size and I did,, but I was wrong for doing that! These jogger pants are ugly and waaay over sized,,, they sag way to low in the crotch and behind. My Teenage son was looking forward to these ,, but let down, bad. He is 12yrs,, 5'11 185-190 pds,, Soo, I went up a size as said to 2xL(well ordered that, but received 3xL, eye roll) he normally wear about a XL or 1X in mens pants like that. But that wasn't just the issue. They were just terrible. They fit in the waist, but the crotch and back(as I said earlier) hung down to his knees,,,, and Not in anyone nice looking. The price was high as well. Now to try and figure out how to send them back, or refund. Will not buy another in this brand, ever. Very disappointed, because they look nice in the pictures. Hope this helps someone, somewhat :)))

reviews.title: If you want cheap pants for a not cheap price tag
reviews.review_text: Pretty dismal quality for the substantially increased price tag. Bought these as an alternative to the really discount Walmart brand joggers of similar style, expecting these to be of superior fit and quality. Unfortunately seams were fraying from the get go and the construction was pretty poor after a few washes after some days of light use. Because this is a third party seller and the pants were already worn, there's nothing I can do about it as far as returning goes, so I'm just stuck with them. Don't waste your money here.

reviews.title: A ZERO
reviews.review_text: I dislike the product because it was not what i ordered. got pants that look like sweat pants . Nothing like the one I ordered before and it took over a month to get them. Also they look like women's pants and they are too small not even the correct size.

reviews.title: Sad.....
reviews.review_text: Brought my son a 4x because he wear a 3x in black and red got them here and he couldn't put them pass his thighs. I was so mad because these was some of the items he wanted for Christmas had to send them back so disappointed....
Runs large with extremely long inseam. Good for 6 ft plus. Nice pockets and belt loops help with size problem seem to be well made,
Great color; awesome fit and son loves them! Definitely will be purchasing this color and style again.

reviews.title: Sizing Completely WRONG
reviews.review_text: Sizing is completely wrong. These said they were 4X. They weren't even close. I have 2X pants bigger than these.

reviews.title: Nice pants
reviews.review_text: A 2 x was a little bit small, should have got a 3x. Thread was different colors on pants. But not to noticeable

reviews.title: Runs small!
reviews.review_text: Runs very small, not to size! Order 2 sizes bigger!
Love these pants, comfortable with flexibility...nuff said.
Son like them; however, they didn't fit well. Will be returning this item.

reviews.title: Perfect.
reviews.review_text: Extremely hard to find good reliable pants in this style, these joggers are perfect, stylish, the large sizes let me be stylish where I am at in my life.

reviews.title: very disappointed.
reviews.review_text: The pants are nice but came with a hole. the package was intact so it didnt happen during transit, the pants was damaga from before and they still send them like that. very disappointed.

reviews.title: Perfect Joggers
reviews.review_text: I Love these twill joggers they are a perfect fit, this is my second purchase I love them so much. and I like the variety of colors they come in. I will purchase more.

reviews.title: Just what i wanted
reviews.review_text: great- wondered if it would be the bright candy apple red i was looking for and it was in a size that compensate for the tapered style of many joggers

reviews.title: Victorious pants.
reviews.review_text: I love those victorious pants. I bought several of them. Even though they are tall and I have to tailor them for my heights. Easy to wear and easy to take them out.
Says 5X but in truth more a 3X - risk of shopping online....sizes vary according to manufacturer
